#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int bits(int n) {
  int k = 0;
  while (n) {
    k += (n & 1);
    n >>= 1;
  }
  return k;
}

int main() {
  int t, n, dp[1001];
  dp[0] = 0;
  for (int i = 1; i <= 1000; i++) {
    dp[i] = dp[i-1] + bits(i);
  }
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    cin >> n;
    cout << dp[n] << endl;
  }
}
